actions.text: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 240 (Roll no. 369).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Sewell (AL) amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 182 - 240 (Roll no. 369).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A013) offered by Ms. Sewell (AL).

description: An amendment No. 17 printed in House Report 114-639 to strike section 639 which prohibits funds from being used by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection (CFPB) to enforce regulations or rules with respect to payday loans, vehicle title loans, or other similar loans during FY 2017.
purpose: Amendment sought to strike section 639 which prohibits funds from being used by the Bureau of Consumer Financial Protection (CFPB) to enforce regulations or rules with respect to payday loans, vehicle title loans, or other similar loans during FY 2017.
